tag_list: jack, campbell, strategy, dotpad, browser-based, multitouch, arm
overview:
Jack Campbell is a senior technology industry executive and entrepreneur with a specialization in strategic product planning and development.

Mr. Campbell has led projects in the USA, China, and Central Europe since entering the consumer electronics industry in 1987. He has developed products and projects across many segments including car, home, and pro audio gear; mobile music and video players; POS and payment processing products; streaming and set-top video products; commercial RTOS software; consumer embedded and desktop OS; and, desktop and mobile computers for both commercial and consumer applications.

Mr. Campbell is presently the founder and CEO of DotPad, Inc., a Tennessee based startup engaged in the creation of an all-new small computing platform stated to be focused on multitouch UI, ARM based hardware, browser based software, and 4G wireless data. No additional information is known at this time about DotPad, Inc, as the company states that it is in stealth mode until early 2011.
